title: Nancy Pelosi Says Attack on Husband Will Affect Her Political Future
description: In her first televised interview since the attack, Ms. Pelosi also spoke about the first frightening moments after she learned what happened to her husband, Paul Pelosi.
media:credit: Jamie Kelter Davis for The New York Times
media:description: Nancy Pelosi said the attacks on her husband last month and on the Capitol last year were “fueled by misinformation.”
